data.description: Parse the DMOZ RDF file into smaller chunks
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
After submitting a namespace application for Parse::DmozRDF around
    a week ago, Tim Bunce recommended a slight alteration to the module
    name and felt that DMOZ deserved its own root namespace, therefore I
    am re-submitting my application. ParseRDF concisely describes the
    purpose of the module and hopefully a new root namespace called
    "DMOZ" will promote the development of more helpful DMOZ related
    modules. From my work with a commercial database management script I
    have been able to see a great demand for DMOZ content for custom
    databases but in smaller, more manageable sub-sections. The users
    requiring such content do not necessarily have the knowledge or time
    to parse the extremely large RDF file available from dmoz.org and so
    my module will provide the necessary functionality to cut and manage
    this file for them.

    Thankyou for considering my application.
